## Data Processing


```{r}
# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(DBI)
#library(RSQLite)
```

```{r}
# Read in the data
data1 <- read_csv("EDU01a.csv")
```

```{r}
# Only select the columns identified in the instructional document
selected_data1 <- data1 %>%
  select(Area_name, STCOU, ends_with("D")) %>%
  rename(area_name = Area_name)
```
